lyrics_abstract:
Spoken:
This goes out to all the women in the world, especially her.
You know it don't even matter your age, don't even matter yo color.
Yo fellas I ain't forget about y'all.
This is for everybody who like to dance.
Just listen to what I'm sayin' and do it, and take a chance.


I put my hand upon your hip
When I dip you dip we dip
You put your hand upon my hip
When you dip I dip we dip

I put my hand upon your hip
When I dip you dip we dip
You put yours and I put mine
And we can dip down low in a rolling grind

Get on the floor like I said before
Y'all remem[...]
